answers.answer: Hi its not a must to have morning wood , but a healthier diet may help . as long as you can function in a sex act with no worries , however for peace of mind you could ask advice from your Family Doctor , take it from there ,

I would say you should have a physical exam with labs to check for diabetes or thyroid disease, things like that.  But if you smoke, that's the problem.  It ruins your vascular flow and good flow is necessary for erections.  I don't know why this isn't broadcast from the rooftops.  Smoking is not sexy.

question: I m 20 year and for past 2 years i had less or no morning erection . I dont masturbate but i had bad routine, i eat more junk food and i didnt drink milk for past2 years. There is no genetic problem in our family. What is the problem is it serious  health issue or urologist will treat this problem.
title: Npo morning erection
